author: Al Jazeera
title: Uganda's Museveni releases indoor workout video amid lockdown
description: President Yoweri Museveni has banned outdoor exercise to prevent the spread of the new coronavirus.
content:
Ugandan President Yoweri Museveni has released a video to encourage people to keep fit at home under lockdown, after banning outdoor exercise in a bid to halt the spread of the new coronavirus.
In a two-minute and 25-second video published on Thursday, the 7… [+2373 chars]
